exception.name: ErrorGetEndOfUsageDateFailed
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the SE API function getEndOfUsageDate fails to determine the date.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorGetEndOfUsageDateFailed that is thrown if the SE API function getEndOfUsageDate fails to determine the date.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when end of usage date retrieval fails
specification.applicability: End of usage date query operations
